name: God of Destruction
description:
My entry for the 1st GoedWare Game Jam. 

 The theme was: "EXTREMES"

 In converted that theme in an extreme destruction game 😁.

Story They have awakened you..the God of Destruction...how dare they! Now you are going to show why you are that god. Extremely destroy everything in your path and then go back to sleep in peace. Goal

Destroy everything 😈!

The game is a prototype so unfortunately you can finish the game, but the end is nothing special. There was no time for a proper ending. Hopefully you can still enjoy the amount of destruction that is in the game.

Controls

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys

Attack: Spacebar

Switch Attack: Number 1, 2 & 3 (depending on your current level)

Pause Game: Escape 

Toggle Music: M

Toggle Sound Effects: K

Tips (spoilers also)

You can destroy Moons for extra fear and later you can and must destroy the Planets to complete the game.

* I can not win any prices during the Game Jam as Host, but I would appreciate any feedback on the game😊!
